scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev -w @ali/api" "npm run dev -w @ali/worker" "npm run dev:legacy"
scripts.dev:local-family: concurrently -k "FOUNDER_BACKEND_URL=http://127.0.0.1:9091 NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4000 npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:legacy"
scripts.dev:clean: bash -lc 'PIDS=$( { lsof -nP -iTCP:3001 -sTCP:LISTEN -t; lsof -nP -iTCP:4000 -sTCP:LISTEN -t; lsof -nP -iTCP:9091 -sTCP:LISTEN -t; } | sort -u ); [ -n "$PIDS" ] && kill -9 $PIDS || true; npm run dev'
scripts.db:ensure: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f .env ] && source .env; set +a; DB_NAME=$(node -e "const u=new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL||\"postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/ali\");console.log((u.pathname||\"/ali\").replace(/^\\//,\"\"))"); createdb "$DB_NAME" 2>/dev/null || true'
scripts.setup:local: npm run db:ensure && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.prisma:generate: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f .env ] && source .env; set +a; npm run prisma:generate -w @ali/api'
scripts.prisma:migrate: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f .env ] && source .env; set +a; npm run prisma:migrate -w @ali/api'
scripts.prisma:seed: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f .env ] && source .env; set +a; npm run prisma:seed -w @ali/api'
